## MultishiftHelpers.indexOfItem() method

Return the index of the provided item within the list of items.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
indexOfItem(item: GItem): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  item | <code>GItem</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`

## Remarks

`-1` when not found
